means: 鄙视，看不起某人（某事）( despise的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He despised William Pitt, notwithstanding the similar views they both held.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管他和威廉·皮特看法相似，却瞧不起他。

sentence.Network_en: Let me say it again. I despised Wade's life.
sentence.Network_cn: 我再说一遍。我厌恶韦德的生活方式。

PerfectNetExp.abs: gather together our scattered people , free those the slaves the Gentiles , look kindly on those who are despised and detested and let the Gentiles know that you are our God .求你把我们四散漂流的人聚集起来，使那些在异民中的奴隶重获自由，眷顾那些被人轻视和憎恶的，使外方人知道你是我们的天主！

if the drag to follow beauty be such that one abandons the admired way , taking rather the despised path leading to her dreams quickly , who shall cast the first stone ?倘若追求美的努力使人疲倦得放弃了受人称赞的道路，而采取能够迅速实现梦想的但遭人鄙视的途径时，谁还会责怪她呢？
age is rarely despised but when it is contemptible . -- Johnson老年人很少受人鄙视，除非其本身可鄙。——约翰逊
therefore , it is nothing to be afraid of and can be despised .因此不可怕，可以轻视它。

list.abs: No one will despise you ., 没有人看不起你.
...猛男背后都有一个悲剧，而这个悲剧一定是要由于他的成功和高尚而产生，并能引发优秀女性的母性爱怜本能的。despise success 晒命所谓晒命，就是对自己的成功抱以“不过如此尔尔”并且恨不得立即抛弃的的态度，当然这种态度的前提是要用最.
... All the poses,out of focus 我的姿态聚集焦点 I despise 我鄙视 Eff me over,your exposure 你的底片不断的诅咒我.
永恒的美 ... Where these are not,I despise 若非如此，我讨厌， As old Time makes these decay, 一旦朱颜被岁月掳劫，.
小除夕 English, 翻译, 例句,... ... 小球腔菌属 leptosphaeria 小觑 to have contempt for;to despise 小声 in a low voice.

entry.def: If you despise something or someone, you dislike them and have a very low opinion of them.

example.ex: I can never, ever forgive him. I despise him...
example.tran: 我永远不会原谅他。我鄙视他。
她暗地里瞧不起他的工作。

auth_sentence.content: That she despised, as well as disapproved of.
auth_sentence.res_content: That she despised, as well as disapproved of.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That she despised, as well as disapproved of.

auth_sentence.content: Despised! my honourable love trucked for a whore!
auth_sentence.res_content: Despised! my honourable love trucked for a whore!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Despised! my honourable love trucked for a whore!

auth_sentence.content: Elizabeth despised Ann's houseproudness as deeply suburban.
auth_sentence.res_content: Elizabeth despised Ann's houseproudness as deeply suburban.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Elizabeth despised Ann's houseproudness as deeply suburban.
